scripts.test:prepare-db: psql $DATABASE_URL_FOR_SETUP -tc "SELECT 1 FROM pg_database WHERE datname = 'authdb_test'" | grep -q 1 || psql $DATABASE_URL_FOR_SETUP -c 'CREATE DATABASE authdb_test;'
scripts.test: env $(cat .env.test | xargs) npm run test:prepare-db && env $(cat .env.test | xargs) npx prisma migrate deploy && env $(cat .env.test | xargs) jest
